events.message:
Use Debian 8.3 in gitian build guide

Add instructions to clone the gitian.sigs repo

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -305,6 +305,8 @@ Clone the git repositories for bitcoin and Gitian.
 ```bash
 git clone https://github.com/devrandom/gitian-builder.git
 git clone https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin
+git clone https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin-detached-sigs.git
comments.body: Is there a reason to clone bitcoin-detached-sigs manually? For me at least gbuild handles that for me
